name: Rebertha
description:
Almost everyone is already dead when Rebertha arrives in the humble village of Hemcroft.

Trained as a Spirit Weaver, she can save them as long as she acts before their spirits leave the body. But that won't last long while the cause remains unknown and unchecked.

Rebertha intends to uncover why and stop it at the source!

  • Swap back and forth between your regular and spirit form!
  • Solve puzzles and save villagers in this short, comedic, and spooky game!
  • Set in the same world as Final Profit: A Shop RPG.

Made for IGMC: Rebirth game jam.

This game contains occasional coarse language.
